snippet.title: Espire 2 - Reveal Trailer | Meta Quest
snippet.description:
Experience unparalleled stealth action in both single player and cooperative campaigns with Espire 2: a full-fledged VR fps on Meta Quest 2 from developer Digital Lode and publisher Tripwire Presents.

After Espire Operative Poe awakens from a 7 year coma, they once again find themselves at the center of the Espire program. Intel from two other operatives reveals the terrorist group OPHIS’ plot for global domination. With the entire world hanging in the balance, it’s up to Poe and their Espire droids to dismantle OPHIS from the inside.
